Class Plant

java.lang.Object
Plant
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cherrybomb, Peashooter, Sunflower, Wallnut
public abstract class Plant extends Object
This class serves as the abstract base for all plant types in the game. It defines fundamental properties and behaviors common to all plants, such as health, position, and basic interaction logic.
Since:
2025-06-27

  • Constructor Details

    • Plant

      public Plant(String n, double s, int h, int lane, int tile)
      Constructs a new Plant object.
      Parameters:
      n - The name of the plant.
      s - The speed of the plant.
      h - The initial health of the plant.
      lane - The lane number the plant will occupy.
      tile - The tile number the plant will occupy.

  • Method Details

    • action

      public abstract void action(Board b)
      Defines the primary action of the plant. Subclasses must implement this to specify what the plant does (e.g., shoot, produce sun).
      Parameters:
      b - The game board.

    • tryToAction

      public abstract void tryToAction(Board b, double elapsedTime)
      Attempts to make the plant perform its action based on game logic and timers. Subclasses must implement this to define when and how the plant tries to act.
      Parameters:
      b - The game board.
      elapsedTime - The time elapsed since the last update.

    • updateTime

      public void updateTime(double elapsedTime)
      Updates the plant's internal timer for its last action/attack.
      Parameters:
      elapsedTime - The time elapsed since the last game update.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      Allows the plant to take damage, reducing its health.
      Parameters:
      damage - The amount of damage the plant will take.

    • isLaneClear

      public boolean isLaneClear(Tile[] tile)
      Checks if the lane the plant is in has no zombies in front of it.
      Parameters:
      tile - An array of Tile objects representing the lane.
      Returns:
      True if there are no zombies in the lane from the plant's tile onwards, false otherwise.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the plant.
      Returns:
      The plant's name.

      Returns the current health of the plant.

      The plant's health.

    • getLaneNo

      public int getLaneNo()
      Returns the lane number the plant occupies.
      Returns:
      The plant's lane number.

    • getPosition

      public double getPosition()
      Returns the normalized horizontal position of the plant within its tile.
      Returns:
      The horizontal position (0.0 to 1.0).

    • getTileNo

      public int getTileNo()
      Returns the tile number the plant occupies.
      Returns:
      The plant's tile number.

    • updateState

      public void updateState(String state)
      Updates the current visual state of the plant.
      Parameters:
      state - The new state string.

      public String getState()

    • setSize

      public void setSize(double s)
      Sets the visual size or scale of the plant.
